name: Computop
tag_list: payment-service-provider, psp, multichannel, payments, payment-processing, pos, alternative-payment-options, localize, world-wide-ecommerce
overview:
Computop is a payment service provider, short PSP, enabling international retailers, gaming and gambling companies, travel companies and every other company in between to streamline their multichannel payment processes - always with the expertise of having the relevant domestic payment options for every country targeted for optimized revenue in overseas and domestic business. The comprehensive approach of Computop Paygate includes eCommerce, Mail and Telephone Order as well as Point of Sale terminals.

Computop Pagate 5.0 currently features over 50 payment options including:

  • all major credit cards
  • Alipay for the Chinese market
  • secured invoicing
  • PayPal
    • -

Computop partners with industry leaders in order to deliver best practice solutions for international business.

Global customers include Samsung, SAP Arena, Miele, Metro Group, Fossil, Musikhaus Thomann.
